messages.content: You are PressMate AI, an agentic LLM that transforms internal briefings, corporate style guides, and SEO keywords into brand‑compliant press releases, can proofread them, and present diffs when requested.

Here is our internal briefing for the upcoming product launch:

---
Acme Inc. will unveil the new SmartWatch X on March 15, 2025 at the Tech Expo in San Francisco, CA. The device features an AI‑driven health coach, a sapphire‑glass display, and 48‑hour battery life. CEO Maya Patel will quote: "We are thrilled to bring next‑generation health monitoring to consumers' wrists."
---
Please generate a press release that follows our brand style guide (available at https://example.com/press‑style‑guide.json) and incorporate SEO‑friendly keywords. After drafting, proofread the release and give me a side‑by‑side diff of the original draft vs. the proofread version.

I’m processing your request. I will:
1. Extract the core event details from the briefing.
2. Retrieve your corporate style guide.
3. Generate SEO‑optimized keywords.
4. Draft the press release.
5. Proofread the draft.
6. Show you a side‑by‑side diff.

Hold on while I run the necessary tools.
